commands.title: Connect to Database
commands.command: docker exec -it openssl-build-db psql -U openssl_admin -d openssl_builds

commands.title: Database Status
commands.description: Show recent build status from database
commands.command: docker exec -it openssl-build-db psql -U openssl_admin -d openssl_builds -c "SELECT c.name, b.status, b.build_duration_seconds, b.build_date FROM builds b JOIN components c ON b.component_id = c.id ORDER BY b.build_date DESC LIMIT 10;"

commands.title: Reset Database
commands.command: docker-compose -f docker-compose.postgres.yml down && docker volume rm openssl-tools_postgres_data && docker-compose -f docker-compose.postgres.yml up -d
